alert.note: Alert for Coahoma (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Coahoma County through 515 PM CDT... At 445 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Alligator, or 8 miles southwest of Clarksdale, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Clarksdale, Kings, Sherard, Lyon, Rena Lara, Hopson, Bobo, Green Grove, Hillhouse, Beverly, Clover Hill, Farrell and Lurand. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
